name: Fear
effect: Each enemy weirdo within 1 stick who loses its opposed Will roll must move 1 stick away from the psychic.

name: Healing
effect: 1 weirdo within 1 stick of this weirdo and in LoS becomes ready.

name: Meat Puppet
effect: Return 1 Out of Action weirdo to the table and place within 1 stick of the psychic. The returned weirdo's Speed is reduced by 1 (min 1), and rolls with -1DT for all rolls. A weirdo can only be returned to the table once.

name: Mind Control
effect: Targeted enemy takes one action of the psychic's choice.

name: Mind Stab
effect: Target 1 enemy weirdo within 1 stick. Roll on Under Fire table +3.

name: Prescience
effect: Choose any weirdo on the table to either gain +1DT or -1DT for all their actions this round.

name: Telekinesis
effect: Effect: move 1 obstacle or ally up to 1 stick. Attack: move an enemy 1 stick.

name: Teleport
effect: Place the psychic anywhere on the board.
